subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manhattan’s Devon Austin appeared to make a clean block on Siena’s Michael Haddix with 16.2 seconds left, but he was called for a foul as the Jaspers fell to Siena on Saturday.
snippet: Manhattan’s Devon Austin appeared to make a clean block on Siena’s Michael Haddix with 16.2 seconds left, but he was called for a foul as the Jaspers fell to Siena on Saturday.
